problem: Would the top of Mount Fuji stick out of the Sea of Japan?
gt_solution:
The average depth of the Sea of Japan is  5,748 feet (1,752 metres) and its maximum depth is 12,276 feet (3,742 metres)
Mount Fuji is 3,776.24 metres (12,389.2 ft) tall.
facts: The average depth of the Sea of Japan is  5,748 feet (1,752 metres) and its maximum depth is 12,276 feet (3,742 metres)
